snippet.title: RCADE LAUNCH TRAILER - MixMob: Racer 1
snippet.description:
🚨 MixMob: Racer 1 – FULL RELEASE IS HERE 🏁
The world’s first Card Battle Racing Game is now LIVE.
Play free on iOS, Android, and Web → https://www.mixmob.io/

Tired of racing games with no strategy?
Bored of card games that move at a snail’s pace?

Welcome to MixMob: Racer 1
🔥 A bold new game where card strategy meets high-speed racing.
⚡ 3-minute, real-time battles where every card is a move.
🏆 Skill-based, twitchable, high-stakes gameplay.
🤖 Collect & upgrade 100+ MixBots

Master it or get left behind.

—
Racer 1 RCADE Season is Here
🎟️ Unlock the RCADE Battle Pass
🛣️ Master new high-speed tracks
💎 Race. Earn MixPoints. Unlock loot
🧠 Outthink and outplay with 39 cards
🤯And more 

Ready to race? Let’s go → https://www.mixmob.io
Join our community → https://discord.com/invite/mixmob
Subscribe → @MixMobRacer1
